ComicInfo.Summary: *"Okay, So It's Not Such a Wonderful Life" - starring Daredevil* Daredevil is confronted with overwhelming plot devices. To solve his woes, he tries to kill himself. Instead of dying, however, he is treated to what life would be like if other Marvel writers took control of his life. *"What Is Your New Years Resolution?"* Various Marvel characters give their resolutions for a new year. *"This Man, This Meal" - starring She-Bulk* The She-Bulk takes on a grocery store of killer food. *"Hazards of Being a Super-Hero"* A quick survey of problems various heroes have to live with as a result of their awesome powers. *"Auld Lang Syne"* Everyone, and that means everyone, is at Bud's Suds to celebrate the New Year. But will everyone survive Mr. Hide's bomb attack?
